trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked set [total number of dots v] to [0] set [index v] to [1] set [number of dots v] to [16] ask [Please enter 5 cards (B for black and W for white):] and wait set [cards v] to (answer) repeat (5) if <(letter (index) of (cards)) = [W]> then set [total number of dots v] to ((total number of dots) + (number of dots)) end set [number of dots v] to ((number of dots) / (2)) change [index v] by (1) end say (total number of dots)
